185764526.review:
30小時通關最高難度。不會再走同樣難度一次啦，太浪費時間。
謝謝Vaporum將我拉回old school的風格，四種外骨骼成長路線也好玩。但結局太多懸念，看看尚未破的lockdown能補完多少囉。
PS.這類dungeon crawler的秘密機關能改好一點嗎，每張圖破一次後實在會懶得回頭找，結果全是看攻略了事。

185700104.review: Está más bueno que un Kebap

185669214.review: Уныло ощущение что очередной рескин Legend of Grimrock, с той лишь разницей что боевка к бесконечным танцам на пятаках размером с сортир происходит и место для маневра никакого.

185633949.review:
Какое то удовольствие от [strike]Legend of Bioshock[/strike] Vaporum я получил, но это удовольствие портят следующие минусы:

-паззлы с закрывающимися/открывающимися люками (и если падаешь в люк-умираешь) 
-есть паззлы, которые хз как без гайдов проходить
-однообразие врагов
-куча записок и большая часть из них неинтересные
-затянутая продолжительность (в данном случае минус. будь продолжительность не 16 часов а например, 8-10, было бы лучше)
-непродуманные боевые ситуации, когда в маленькой комнате, враги тебя могут зажать со всех сторон
-небольшая локация с радиацией, где ты не можешь пользоваться оружием
-ближе к финалу игра становится очень душной
-сюжет и концовка унылые

Из плюсов стоит отметить сеттинг, боевку и некоторые паззлы.

Итог: если играли в Legend of Grimrock 1-2 и очень хочется чего то похожего, то можете взять, но только по очень щедрой скидке.

185328388.review: Do you want to buy a game, knowing you can't 100%, it as it has a early access exclusive Steam achievement?

185057996.review:

184595264.review:
Another twist on the classic dungeon crawler formula.
Another puzzle-dungeon game (Though not as heavy as Grimrock), this time with a steampunk twist. Only one character you have to keep track of, and a few different play styles as well.
Can be beaten in a few hours.

Make sure to save often! You can and will lose lots of time IF you don't save. I learned this lesson and lost upwards of 20 minutes.

184582373.review:
Legend of Grimrock brought back the old school dungeon crawlers and made them cool again. Vaporum is one of those games that came after LoG and is surprisingly good, nearly as good as Grimrock in my opinion. Its mechanics are very similar, but with unique twists and features. That, together with completely different setting (steam punk) makes Vaporum an original and interesting game that every fan of dungeon crawlers should have in their collection.
You play as a single man who enters the mysterious tower full of traps, puzzles and deadly machines trying to kill him. You explore the tower and discover the secrets behind that dark and frightening construction and its inhabitants. And you fight numerous enemies. I played on hard difficulty and the game wasn't too difficult - except those (way too frequent) moments when you press the button or enter the room and suddenly you're locked in a very small area with huge number of enemies attacking from all sides. Also, I was a bit disappointed with the secrets - which I love to discover by myself. While initially they were based on some clever ideas, later on they become purely based on hidden switches that are difficult to find - who has time and patience to observe every inch of every wall to find the small switch that opens hidden stash?
But apart from those minor issues the game is very nicely put, everything works perfectly and bug-free, skills and level progression are interesting and allow for different builds. The story while not groundbreaking, fits the overall setting well and kept me interested throughout the game. If you're a fan of "modern" dungeon crawlers - this is something you have to play.

184517289.review:
Malý krokovací dungeon crawler ve steampunkovým provedení.
Právě kýčovitý steampunk provedení mě od zahrání dlouho odrazovalo, ale nakonec se ukázalo, že zdejší steampunk není až taková hrůza a navíc je to opravdu prvotřídní dungeon se vším všudy.

+ velmi tuhé ale velmi zábavné a vyladěné souboje, pokud používáte pauzování boje, v reálném čase je obtížnost opravdu extrémní
+ na malé indie studio velmi dobrá temná vizuální stránka hry
+ česká lokalizace
- jen 3 třídy hlavní postavy a zcela minimální RPG prvky :-(
- příběh je takový minimální, navíc je z větší části tupě prezentován nalezenými dopisy a poznámkami
- zbytečně přehnaná obtížnost u finálního bosse, navíc je to jediné místo ve hře, kde nefunguje quicksave/quickload, až do finálního boje jsem si věřil, že dám celou hru bez jediného zranění

Vzato kolem a kolem asi ta nejzábavnější hra co kdy přišla ze Slovenska, když tedy pominu legendární DOSovou tahovku Spellcross: Poslední Bitva. Škoda, že kromě prequelu Lockdown už asi nikdy pokračování nevznikne, špatné prodeje.

184326206.review: Nice graphics, enjoyable gameplay and puzzles. Unless i run into annoying puzzles, it's a definite recommend!

183855094.review: 有些隱藏按鈕或機關要自己找蠻有趣的

183603161.review:
Easily recommended to fans of dungeon crawlers, it holds its own against the best in the genre but suffers some of the same pitfalls such as occasionally relying too heavily on obscure puzzles to move forward. I would also recommend you check out Operencia, StarCrawlers, Infinite Adventures, Legend of Grimrock, Might and Magic X, Bard's Tale IV, Dungeon Travelers, Sakura Dungeon, or Etrian Odyssey.

+Visuals, environments
+Options, rebinding
+Voiced dialogue and main character
+Difficulty options
+Auto and manual saves
+Intuitive controls
+Choice of rig/class
+Variety of skills, weapons/armor
+Choices on level up
+Automap
+Gadgets
+Variety of builds
+Time slow/stop

-No character creation
-Some obscure puzzles block progress
-Frequent backtracking
-No minimap
-Interactables not always clear
-Items/keys need manual use, not detect inventory
-Many junk items, no selling/convert
-Leveling can feel slow
-Some instant death trap gimmicks
-Infrequent autosaves
-Some speed puzzles
-Unclear direction at times
